text: Graham Nesbitt (born 18 February 1983 in Plymouth, Devon, England) is a professional British basketball player, and currently plays for the Plymouth Raiders in the British Basketball League. Nesbitt spent a few years overseas in the United States with the foreign exchange program. He lived in Lebo, Kansas and played his senior year of high school basketball as a Lebo Wolf. Also played tennis at ICC in Independence, Kansas. The 6-foot 5 forward attended Indiana University-Purdue University Fort Wayne and, following a brief spell in 2003/04 with Solent Stars, is now in his rookie season as a professional basketball player with his hometown team the Plymouth Raiders. ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:British Basketball League players Category:English men's basketball players Category:Junior college men's basketball players in the United States Category:Sportspeople from Plymouth Category:Plymouth Raiders players
title: Graham Nesbitt
